title: Honey cake
ingredients: ['450g (1 lb) plain flour', '1/4 teaspoon salt', '1 1/2 teaspoons baking powder', '1 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '2 teaspoons ground cinnamon', '1 1/2 teaspoons ground allspice', '4 eggs', '150g (5 oz) caster sugar', '4 tablespoons vegetable oil', '475ml (16 fl oz) honey', '120ml (4 fl oz) strong brewed coffee', '75g (3 oz) almonds', '75g (3 oz) raisins', 'Glaze', '350ml (12 fl oz) honey', '2 tablespoons lemon juice', '120ml (4 fl oz) water', '1/2 teaspoon lemon zest', '50g (2 oz) flaked almonds for topping']
